Name: LLP011 List adddresses to select from
Output_template:
{"lookup_validation":"0","secure_fields_db_database":"","results_page_columns_db":"","escapeTokens":"yes","systemName":"Firmstep Solutions Read","query":"select CONCAT(trim(concat(sao,' ',pao)),' ',street_name,', ',town_name) as display, uprn as name
FROM llpgcache
WHERE 
(
(REPLACE(postcode, ' ','') = REPLACE({postcode_search_after},' ',''))
OR (concat(trim(concat(sao,' ',pao)),' ',street_name) like concat('%',{postcode_search_after},'%'))
)
AND length(REPLACE({postcode_search_after},' ',''))>5
AND postcode != ''
ORDER BY CAST(pao AS SIGNED),sao,street_name ASC LIMIT 300","systemID":"59dc224eb4f63"}
